tool_description: Convert you html code in to PDF file.
name: HTML2PDF Converter
title: HTML2PDF Converter

api_list.name: htmlConvert
api_list.description: Convert HTML code to PDF base64.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://html2pdf-converter.p.rapidapi.com/html-convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html2pdf-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://html2pdf-converter.p.rapidapi.com/html-convert"

headers = {

print(response.json())
